title: PGIMER Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for Senior Research Fellow Posts
description: Post Graduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER) has released an official notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Senior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2026 . Herewe included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
